Enter TODAY for a chance to WIN R5000 and fame throughout Africa

homechoice blankets are a much-loved favourite in homes across South Africa. Now, we are giving YOU the chance to design a brand-new blanket. You could WIN R5 000 in cash AND have your blanket added to the homechoice range and sold nationwide.

A panel of experts will select the top three designs, and the public will get to vote for the WINNER!

Cash prizes and nationwide fame
The WINNING design will receive R5 000 in cash, the opportunity to name the blanket and nationwide fame as the designer of a homechoice blanket.
